scripts.mkdirs: mkdir -p dist/assets && mkdir -p dist/styles && mkdir -p dist/scripts
scripts.copy: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:bower
scripts.build:css: node-sass styles/sass/styles.sass --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' > styles/css/styles.min.css
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run copy
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.postbuild: npm run postbuild:css && npm run postbuild:js
scripts.watch:css: onchange 'styles/**/*.sass' -- npm run build:css && npm run postbuild:css
scripts.watch:js: onchange 'scripts/*.js' -- npm run build:js && npm run postbuild:js
